(Hoe could reptilica see the pod in the computer's screem if Vamprah 
has broken is with her Banshee's scream????????)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Reptilica::
> 
> The door to the CR chamber opens, and one of Reptilica's feet steps 
> out. The other one begins heading toward it, but hits the bottom of 
> the CR chamber, making Reptilica trip out of the CR and fall on his 
> face. He gets up, still a bit daze from the battle that had got him 
> so much damage.
> 
> He looks around, seeing DevilDuer and a few other bots on one side 
of 
> the room. Walking to a console, he looks at it, seeing a pod ont he 
> scanners.
> 
> "Hmmm..." he says, walking out of the room and heading for the exit 
> of the Alliance base.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jason Lind" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:
> > Blade Runner
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > the signal got even more stronger. "to anyone or anything this is 
> Blade

> kept on
